original: Engelmann, Johan, fabrikör, Kinna-hult, f. 7/11/87 i Runnburg, Böhm., av tegelmäst. Josef E. o. Franciska Kumpf. G. 09m. Anna Frühauf. Barn: Gerhard f. 09, Lotte 12, Fritz 22. — Borg:sk. i Runnburg 01. Anst. v. olika färgerier i Tyskl. 04-20, färgmäst. v. Färgeri A-B Lind & Co. i Borås 20-37, grund. o. inneh. av Sjuhärads-bygdens Färgeri i Kinnahult sed. 37. Ordf. i Tyska fören. i Borås 33-37. Medl. av Odd Fellow. Hobby: trädg:-odling.
translated: Engelmann, Johan, factory owner, Kinna-hult, b. 7/11/87 in Runnburg, Bohemia, son of brickmaster Josef E. and Franciska Kumpf. Married in 1909 to Anna Frühauf. Children: Gerhard b. 1909, Lotte b. 1912, Fritz b. 1922. Became a citizen of Runnburg in 1901. Employed at various dyeing companies in Germany from 1904-1920, became a master dyer at Dyeing A-B Lind & Co. in Borås from 1920-1937, and founded and owned Sjuhärads-bygdens Dyeing in Kinnahult since 1937. Served as chairman of the German Association in Borås from 1933-1937. Member of Odd Fellow. Hobby: gardening.

structured.name: Johan Engelmann
